title: Agent Configuration Schema
description: Schema for configuring Amazon Q Developer CLI agents

description.description: A description of the agent's purpose

prompt.description: (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED) The system prompt that defines the agent's behavior and capabilities

mcpServers.description: Configuration for Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers

command.description: The command to run the MCP server

args.description: Arguments to pass to the MCP server command

disabled.description: Whether or not the server will be intialized. This is a legacy field from mcp.json

tools.description: List of tools the agent can see. Use "@{MCP_SERVER_NAME}/tool_name" to specify tools from mcp servers. To include all tools from a server, use "@{MCP_SERVER_NAME}"

alias.description: Tool aliases for remapping tool names

allowedTools.description: List of tools the agent is explicitly allowed to use

includedFiles.description: Files to include in the agent's context

createHooks.description: Commands to run when the agent is created

promptHooks.description: Commands to run before processing each prompt
